metadata.title: "Copying Is Not Theft" - music and vocals, FLAC file
metadata.creator: Nina Paley
metadata.description: Final version of the music from QuestionCopyright.org's first "Minute Meme." Score arranged and recorded by Nik Phelps. Vocals by Connie Champagne. Song and animation by Nina Paley.
metadata.subject: copyleft; copyfight; cartoon; bunnies; bunny; bicycle; freedom; free culture; animation; libre; education; musical; questioncopyright; copyright; culture
